content: **knitted mittens with nordic pattern in drops lima ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #nordicoakmittens drops design pattern li-184 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m m/l circumference approx 21-23 cm full length approx 19-20 cm length of thumb-gusset approx 7-7 cm finger-length approx 11-12 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 9024 almond 100-100 g colour 100 off white **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with nordic pattern on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
